snippet.title: Sword Reverie - [2020] Steam Wishlist Trailer
snippet.description:
Sword Reverie is a JRPG inspired VR action game.

Wishlist our game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1377430/Sword_Reverie/

Learn more: https://swordreverie.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SwordReverie/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SwordReverie
Discord: https://discord.gg/dUnGj3f
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/SwordReverie/

Platforms: PC VR (Oculus + Steam VR). PSVR and Quest are also possible at a later date.

Fight with style:
Launch unique abilities by moving your body.
Use physics based combat to defeat a variety of enemies.

Go on an adventure:
Get summoned to save a different world as an anime protagonist.
Explore a large fantasy environment with Stella as your companion.

Become a master:
Unlock new abilities and craft powerful weapons.
Change your strategy to overcome new unique challenges.

Sword Reverie is inspired by our favorite Japanese games and anime such as Legend of Zelda, Ni No Kuni, and SAO and VR games such as Blade and Sorcery, Gorn, Swords of Gargantua, and The Walking Dead Saints & Sinners.
